SpiderNest_CustomCrime.synopsis: Unvoiced crime dialogue, spoken by any goblin who witnesses a player attacking or killing a prisoner thrown into the spider pit at the goblin camp

TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom.synopsis: Crime dialogue when a random goblin sees you hurting or killing Liam.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The session 'SpiderNest_CustomCrime' is triggered when a goblin in the spider pit witnesses you attacking or killing a prisoner, while the session 'TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom' occurs when a random goblin sees you hurting or killing Liam. There is no indication in the provided information that one of these events causes the other or that they influence each other. Each is tied to different contexts and locations within the game. Therefore, there is neither a necessary order between these sessions nor are they mutually exclusive; they can occur independently.

SpiderNest_CustomCrime_0.speaker: Narrator
SpiderNest_CustomCrime_0.text: *The goblins appear rather attached to their prisoners. Best not brutalise any more of them.*

TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_0.speaker: Narrator
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_0.text: *The goblin appears annoyed. It might be best to leave the prisoner alone.*
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Assault - gobs don't know about Den

TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_1.speaker: Narrator
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_1.text: *It seems the prisoner you killed was rather valuable. Now the price is on your head.*
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Murder - gobs don't know about Den

TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_2.speaker: Narrator
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_2.text: *The goblin is uneasy. Drow or not, you aren't supposed to be interfering with the prisoner.*
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Assault - gobs don't know about DenNodeContext: They have to warn the drow not to hurt the prisoner again, but they are extremely scared the drow will kill them.

TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_3.speaker: Narrator
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_3.text: *You sense you've gone too far. Deference to your kind won't dissuade this goblin from killing you.*
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Assault - gobs don't know about DenNodeContext: They have to kill the drow, but they are terribly scared.

TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_4.speaker: Narrator
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_4.text: *It seems the goblin is no longer content to let you have your fun. This might get messy.*
TortureredAdventurer_AssaultCustom_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Assault - gobs don't know about Den
